vfdr

Class NumericAntd

  • java.lang.Object
    • vfdr.Antd
      • vfdr.NumericAntd

  • public class NumericAntd
extends Antd
    Antecedent for numerical attributes, of the form {NumericAttribute <= number} or {NumericAttribute > number}. The condition type (<= or >) is stored as a boolean, and the split point as a double.
    Version:
    VFDR-Base
    Author:
    Clément Fournier (clement.fournier@insa-rennes.fr)

      Builds a numeric antecedent from the attname
